title: RBI monetary policy: A repo rate decision is going to be a juggling act for Governor Sanjay Malhotra
description:
The Reserve Bank of India’s repo rate decision on Wednesday is going to be a close call, amid benign inflation and still robust economic growth in the face of 50% US tariffs on India. RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra. (PTI)

While a majority of economists—24 of 39 surveyed by Bloomberg News—predict the ...
